resources.string: Please select the media type to generate the gif......

This free offline tool for making Gif from either images or video. You can select either images or a video to generate a gif. If you select a video you can then specify the length of the generated gif and the size by select the version. You can also use a GifPlayer to play your own GIFs.
-Please don\'t forget to review us on GooglePlay
You can select either a video or images from gallery to generate a gif. Just click, open gallery, select media and that\'s it!!

Please click the below button to generate an awesome gif. Remember that it may take some time to finish depending on the number of images you selected. You can also add image/s, delete image and change images order.

Please click the below button to generate an awesome gif. Remember that it may take some time to finish depending on the duration of your selected video. \nThe generation version controls the generated gif size and duration, please click beside a version to get more information.
Recommended for short videos because it has normal size, normal duration, video details are more clarified in the generated gif.
Recommended for extreme long videos because it has light size, short duration, video details are more summarized and briefed in the generated gif.
Thank you for using our gif tool. If you like it please review us now
No GIFs to show, please click above to generate some
